benefits.practicalKnowledge: The online program focuses on practical knowledge
benefits.adaptedToNeeds: Individual lessons tailored to your needs and learning pace
benefits.experiencedTeacher: Experienced teachers guarantee an enjoyable learning experience
benefits.businessCourses: Business language courses supporting career development

programs.businessLanguage: Individual and group business language classes

individualCourse.title: Individual courses
individualCourse.description: Individual courses are designed with your language needs in mind! If you want to express yourself fluently, achieve grammatical perfection, or prepare for exams and certificates, individual lessons are the ideal solution.

personalizedApproach.description: Your teacher will tailor the program to your specific goals and proficiency level. Each lesson will be in line with your expectations.

flexibleSchedule.description: Individual courses are designed to fit your pace.Schedule lessons according to your own timetable to make learning convenient and effective.

skillDevelopment.description: Whether you want to achieve perfect grammar, communicate fluently, or obtain an important language certificate - individual lessons will help you achieve your goals.

groupCourse.title: Group courses
groupCourse.description: Learn a new language in small groups, where learning becomes an interactive adventure. Intensive classes guarantee quick results, allowing you to develop your language skills in a dynamic and friendly way.

smallGroups.description: Our 4-5 person groups allow the teacher to take a more individualized approach to each participant. Collaboration in a small community promotes faster assimilation of the material.

motivatingGroup.description: Our courses are not just about listening to lectures, but above all about active participation. Group exercises, language games, and role-plays will make learning an engaging interaction.

selfStudyMaterials.description: We offer a rich set of materials that enable independent work outside of classes. This is a great opportunity to reinforce knowledge and develop skills at your own pace.

businessCourse.title: Specialized language - business courses
businessCourse.description: Business language courses are available in the form of individual and group classes. The lessons cover various aspects of business, including broad business communication from areas such as finance, logistics, trade, marketing, management, and customer service.

realCases.description: Authentic business cases practiced during classes allow you to develop communication skills in business situations.

wideRange.description: No matter the area of business that interests you, our classes cover a wide range of topics. Our group courses will prepare you to work in various business fields.

industryVocabulary.description: Learning specialized terminology will help you in your job search in your desired industry or in advancing on your current career path.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you need more information, would like to discuss something related to our language courses, or have other questions, please don't hesitate to contact us using the available contact details.

formFeedback.success: Thank you for your message. We will get in touch with you soon.
formFeedback.failure: The message was not sent. Please try to contact us directly by phone or email.
